import React, { Component } from 'react' import defaultimg from "./default.jpg" export class NewsItems extends Component { render() { let {title, description, imgurl, url, author, time} = this.props; return (
Success
{title}

{description}

Last Updated on {new Date(time).toGMTString()}

By {author?author:"Unknown"}

Read More
) } } export default NewsItems
